item.title: Adhoc mobile notifications for a sysadmin using Pushover
item.description: Adhoc notifications Sometimes, a sysadmin just likes to get notified of certains events occuring in the system - “Backups started” or “/scratch is 80% full” etc. The simplest way I could find to get this done is using a paid mobile app + API called Pushover. How do I do it? curl -s --form-string "token=aggrvorgrf85qvk3454kut5ev" --form-string "user=ut5rmuvjr5gdsfhbdrgxzzjqcdfdfhd31" --form-string "message=Gotham scratch disk used above 80 percent" https://api.pushover.net/1/messages.json
